Package cartas

Class Baraja

  • java.lang.Object
    • cartas.Baraja
  • Direct Known Subclasses:
    BarajaEspanhola, BarajaFrancesa

    public abstract class Baraja
extends java.lang.Object
    Clase abstracta que modela una baraja y la gestiona.
